Onderwerp: Re: [nihontostudy] tsuba designs?


Matt,
    Here is a later version of a design book for tsuba and fittings.  
https://secure.bibliology.com/enquiry_ba/Enquiry_Options.html?aabid=1166
6708
I found it a while back, but thought it was too expensive and too late.
If 
it contained designs from the 1600's I probably would have snatched it
up.  I 
would think that there have to be some earlier design books kicking
around in 
Japan.

Lou
